title: Bug 10022 - Incorrect 'Build' popup action enablement
OB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled.
EB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should be enabled only when a valid build configuration is present for the project.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Right-click on a project in the Project Explorer.
3. Check if the 'Build' action is enabled in the context-sensitive popup menu.
